Dropped Content: A significant clause in the translation is removed. Please identify that error.  Source: Die Asian German Sports Exchange Programme ist eine nicht kommerzielle Nichtregierungsorganisation, die sich zur Aufgabe gemacht hat, den Friedensprozess, vor allem in Sri Lanka, nachhaltig durch das Motto „connecting sportspeople“ mitzugestalten.
Translation: The Asian German Sports Exchange Programme is an organisation that has set itself the task of sustainably shaping the peace process, especially in Sri Lanka, through the motto "connecting sportspeople".
The translation contains an error pertaining to
Options:
(A) Modifiers or Adjectives
(B) Numerical Values
(C) Negation or Antonyms
(D) Named Entities
(E) Dropped Content
(F) Facts
model_outputs.model_answer: The translation contains an error pertaining to (A) Modifiers or Adjectives. The original text mentions the motto "connecting sportspeople" as a way to sustainably shape the peace process, but the translation changes it to "shaping the peace process" without any mention of the motto. This change removes the adjective "connecting" and changes the focus of the translation from the specific actions being taken to the overall goal of the organization.

model_outputs.model_answer: The translation contains an error pertaining to (A) Modifiers or Adjectives. Instead, the translation uses the word "all" as a determiner before the noun "cultural monuments." This is a grammatical error in English.
